Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Penis \Pe"nis\ (p[=e]"n[i^]s), n. [L.] (Anat.) The erectile external sexual organ of males, used in copulation, and in mammals, also for urination. [1913 Webster +PJC]
penis n : the male organ of copulation (`member' is a euphemism) [syn: {phallus}, {member}] [also: {penes} (pl)]
